Instruction: Set the oven to preheat at 375°F (190°C).

In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, salt, and baking powder by sifting them together. Gradually incorporate milk to form a soft dough. Shape the dough into a round and position it on an ungreased baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes. After removing the loaf from the oven, slice it in half and return to bake for an additional 10 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack to cool before serving.
